name: Sunny Bug Game
description:
INSTALLATION

1. Download SunnyBugGame.zip

2. Extract files

3. Start the game by double clicking with your left mouse cursor SunnyBugGame.exe

CONTROLS

Movement: w,a,s,d or arrow keys + mouse

Actions: Shift, mouse left button

Exit game: esc

OTHER

The game is still on development and free to play.
